item.title: sfForkedDoctrineApplyPlugin 1.5.9
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
sfForkedDoctrineApply just got updated to new version - 1.5.9. It contains Portuguese translation created by Alan Candido, so I hope it will get useful for even more people now.

item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
New version of sfForkedDoctrineApply plugin has been released. Actually it was released twice (1.5.7 and a day later 1.5.8), because of my mistake spotted by John Kary (thanks!).

item.title: sfForkedDoctrineApplyPlugin 1.5.6 - Spanish translation
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
New version of sfForkedDoctrineApplyPlugin has just been released. This version introduces Spanish translation files and few tweaks to the model. Because of these changes, remember to run migrations!

  • Changes made in the plugin since version 1.5.5

  • Plugin's version's symfony pages

  • Plugin's version github pages

item.title: sfForkedDoctrineApplyPlugin 1.5.5 - now speaks German
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
Another version of sfForkedDoctrineApply doesn't bring any new functionality nor fixes (thankfully). It just adds new translation files - this time German.

..TEASER_END

Translation was created by Daniel Hanke and provided by Tristan Bessoussa. Adding this translation means that sfForked is availabe in 6 languages altogether: English, French, Italian, German, Russian and Polish.

  • Changes made in the plugin since version 1.5.4: Changelog

  • Plugin's version's symfony pages:

    http://www.symfony-project.org/plugins/sfForkedDoctrineApplyPlugin/1_5_5

  • Plugin's version github pages:

    https://github.com/fizyk/sfForkedDoctrineApplyPlugin/tree/v1.5.5

item.title: fzTagPlugin 1.2.3 and sfForkedDoctrineApply 1.5.4
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
I had to quite fast update both fzTagPlugin and sfForkedDoctrineApply, and since Me and several other users discovered some bugs just after I thought it's all fixed, both plugins had several releases. Crazy sunday as it might seem.
